import { Field, Formik, Form, ErrorMessage } from 'formik' import { values } from 'lodash' import './login.css' import * as Yup from "yup"; const validationSchema = Yup.object({ email: Yup.string().email('Invalid email format').required('Required'), password: Yup.string().required('Required') }) export default function Login() { return ( handleSubmit(values, { setFieldValue })} validationSchema={validationSchema} > {({ isValid, dirty, values }) => (
)}
) }
